definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: God rejects the requests of those who sinfully despise the Savior.
sentences.chinese: 上帝拒絕那些有罪地蔑視救主的人的要求。

sentences.english: O holy Jesus, Prince of peace and Saviour.
sentences.chinese: 聖哉耶穌，萬民救主和平王。

sentences.english: Pray for him to govern with justice and righteousness and to know Christ as his Lord and Savior.
sentences.chinese: 願他以公平和正義秉政並接受基督作他的主和救主。

sentences.english: The same Redeemer is present in the sacrament of the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 也是這位救主，臨在於聖體聖事當中。

sentences.english: It was a professing church, but not a possessing church.
sentences.chinese: 他是一間口頭承認救主，卻沒有真正擁有救主的教會。

sentences.english: It was a professing church, but not a possessing church.
sentences.chinese: 他是一間口頭承認救主，卻沒有真正擁有救主的教會。

sentences.english: Emannuel, God is with us, Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.
sentences.chinese: 以馬內利，與人同在的神，聖潔的救主，永活的道。

sentences.english: 11Today in the town of David a Savior has been born to you; he is Christ the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 因今天在大衛的城裏，爲你們生了救主，就是主基督。

sentences.english: Jesus' first coming was as Savior to save those lost in sin.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌第一次降世，是做救主，要拯救陷在罪惡中的人。

sentences.english: I had met the Savior and nothing was getting between us.
sentences.chinese: 我已經遇到了救主，我不貪求什麼。

sentences.english: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
sentences.chinese: 這是好的，在神我們救主面前可蒙悅訥。

sentences.english: Friend, you can trust the Man that died for you.
sentences.chinese: 朋友，你可以信託那替你死的救主。

sentences.english: Thise is my story, this is my song, Praising my Saviour all the day long.
sentences.chinese: 常談主慈愛，並唱主恩，讚美我救主，晝夜不分。

sentences.english: I turn from my sin and receive you as Savior.
sentences.chinese: 我如今從罪中回頭，接受禰做我生命的救主。

sentences.english: And my spirit has exulted in God my Savior;
sentences.chinese: 我靈曾以神我的救主爲樂。

sentences.english: Verily thou art a God that hidest thyself, O God of Israel, the Saviour.
sentences.chinese: 救主以色列的神阿，你實在是自隱的神。
